Grand Olympiad Manager:
Once the Olympiad period ends, Olympiad Points are awarded to participating Noblesse. In order to exchange Olympiad Points for Olympiad Tokens, you must first participate in at least 15 matches. You can exchange 1 Olympiad Point for 1,000 Olympiad Tokens. For example, if you have 55 Olympiad Points you can receive 55,000 Olympiad Tokens.
Those who achieve hero status are eligible to receive additional Olympiad Tokens equivalent to 200 Olympiad Points.

Class Basis Points
1st Rank Top 1% 100 pt
2nd Rank Top 10% 75 pt
3rd Rank Top 25% 55 pt
4th Rank Top 50% 40 pt
5th Rank Top 100% 30 pt
